name: Distant Shores (GusDT)
description:
This project was made over 3 days in the January 2022 Global Game Jam Competition by a team of 6 developers. It was made using Unity Engine and C# code, without any of the engine's in-built tools. The theme for that year's competition was solely the word 'Duality', which we interpreted in a moral sense.

My Role:

My role in this project was lead concept designer, narrative director, scriptwriter, and QA tester. I also ended up doing a lot of project management and organisation to ensure that the team reached its goals in the very short timeframe that we had.

Devlog:

Please click here to see how the game was made and the challenges that we had to overcome.
